pages.title: ProjectRed
pages.text: ProjectRed brings vastly improved redstone control via compact wiring and integrated logic gates. The overall idea is to make your redstone projects a lot simpler and compact.$(br2)$(l:https://projectredwiki.com/wiki/Main_Page)ProjectRed Wiki$(/l)

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: The wiki has everything you need to know about the mod and its modules.
